title: Verify the response of an information request with valid extDevice_Driving license

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Prerequisite:

1)In PV complete a ticket sale transaction with will call delivery method 
2) Note the agency of user, event date range,extDevice(scan device id)
2. Get the Driving license ID number 

Steps to follow

1.Run the Query and obtain the hashed number

select distinct 
        d.HASHED_WILL_CALL_CARD_NMBR as "Hashed Will Call Card Number"
from 
        patron_order po
        inner join 
        order_line_item oli     on 
                po.order_id = oli.order_id
        inner join 
        delivery d on oli.transaction_id = d.transaction_id
where 
        oli.order_id = 

Then encode the hashed number in the following site:

.
3. Launch the Tool for Will call API
4. Select the HTTP method as GET by clicking on  the GET radio button
5. Set the authentication parameters: Username and  password, Auth type select as BASIC and Check  Preemptive checkbox
6. Select SSl tab and set the hostname verfier to 'Allow All'
7. Setup the URL for the information Request in the following  format:

https://irutapppvn54.back.tickets.com:18443/provenue-api/willcall/v1/info/deliveries?max=50&range=c&agency=AGENCYname&extDevice=validID&idNumber=IDnumber

Enter desired value for 'max'
Range can be selected as 'c' or 'a' or 't' as per the event date
Agency should be the corresponding agency for which transcation was completed 
idNumber should be the encoded hashed number obtained
extDevice should be valid external device ID noted in pre Requisite
8. i)Enter the URL for Informational request (with valid extDevice and valid values for other parameters also) mentioned in previous step
ii)Click Green Arrow Button
9. Verify the Response displayed.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Transcation should be completed successfully with will call delivery method

Agency, event date range and scan device to be used should be noted down
2. Credit card ID number should be obtained
3. Tool should be launched successfully
4. Radio button should be selected for GET
5. Authentication parameters should be selected  successfully
6. SSL tab setting should be set successfully
7. URL for the information Request should be set up successfully
8. Response should be valid and correct  informations should be provided without any errors
9. Following details should be included in the Response

Ãº Number of tickets in the request
Ãº Delivery ID
Ãº Delivery Name
Ãº Order ID
Ãº Transaction ID
Ãº Event ID
Ãº Event Code
Ãº Event Description
Ãº Attending Patron Account ID
Ãº Patron Contact First Name
Ãº  Patron Contact Last Name
Ãº Ticket ID
Ãº Section Code
Ãº Section Description
Ãº  Row
Ãº  Seat
Ãº  Buyer Type
Ãº  Price Scale Code
Ãº  Price Scale Description
Ãº  Price

Barcode and Print Stream should not be included

title: Make changes to qualifying group and Apply Changes with the edit panel open
custom_preconds:
A loyalty program that contains a variety of qualifying groups will need to be used for this test case.

NOTE: At the time this test case is being written, the button says 'Save' but there is an Improvement issue - PV-28179 - asking for the button to be re-labeled 'Continue' so it may change by the time of the next test run.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Make one or more changes to one of the qualifying groups, but DO NOT click save (or continue).
With the edit panel still open, select the APPLY CHANGES button.
2. Select CONTINUE
3. Make one or more changes to one of the qualifying groups, but DO NOT click save (or continue).
With the edit panel still open, select the APPLY CHANGES button.
4. Select CANCEL
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. The 'multiple changes detected' modal shall be displayed.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/33664)

2. 1.  The modal shall be closed.
2.  A growl message saying changes have been successfully is displayed.
3.  The updated values for the qualifying group shall be reflected in the qualifying groups table.
4.  The 'Apply Changes' and 'Reset' buttons shall be disabled.
3. The 'multiple changes detected' modal shall be displayed.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/33664)
4. 1.  The modal shall be closed.
2.  The 'Apply Changes' and 'Reset' buttons shall remain enabled.
3.  The 'Edit qualifying group' panel shall remain open with pending edits remaining in the fields.

title: Verify by resetting scan tickets after Early Arrival Bonus Time
custom_preconds:
Navigate to Loyalty Administration and Create a Loyalty Program with Early Arrival Bonus Time set as 1 hour before event

Set Base Points and Early Arrival Bonus for all Scan Media Types

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Create an Event and navigate to loyalty tab in Event 
2. Search Loyalty Program in Event administration and associate it to event
3. Purchase tickets from the Event 
4. Complete Resale for few tickets
5.  Print all tickets
6. Scan the tickets
7. Change Base and early arrival points for Scan media types
8. Reset the scan
9. Verify the points for the patron are deducted
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Navigated succesfully
2. Loyalty Program with active status will be displayed
3. User should be able to complete sale
4. Resale should be completed
5. Tickets should be printed
6. User should able to scan the tickets
7. Points should be changed
Example:  Set base points at 10 and early arrival at 20 before.  Scan in early.  Change base points to 20 and early arrival to 50 after scan  
8. Scan's should be reset to 0
9.  Only points earned through scan will be deducted

Example:  Set base points at 10 and early arrival at 20.  Scan in early.  Change base points to 20 and early arrival to 50.  Reset scan.  Verify that 30 points are deducted, not 70.
